info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 5:55PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHERN NEW LONDON AND NORTH CENTRAL MIDDLESEX COUNTIES THROUGH 645 PM EDT... At 554 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from near Canterbury to New Britain. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... East Hampton and Cromwell around 600 PM EDT. Colchester and Lisbon around 605 PM EDT. Griswold and Voluntown around 610 PM EDT. Norwich around 615 PM EDT. Jewett City and Bozrah around 620 PM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for southern Connecticut.
